title: Trump says 14th amendment cases, media made him ‘much more popular’ than ever before
description: At a campaign rally in Cedar Rapids, Iowa on Saturday, former President Trump said the attempts to bar him from the ballot using the 14th Amendment and the media have made him “much more popular” than he was in 2016 or 2020. title: Cheney: Johnson was ‘a collaborator’ in Trump’s effort to remain in power
description: Former Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.) claims that Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) was “a collaborator” in former President Trump’s efforts to remain in power after the 2020 election. “If you look at what Donald Trump is trying to do, he can’t do it by himself. title: Sunday shows preview: Israel reignites war in Gaza; 2024 primary inches closer
description: Israel's return to combat after a temporary truce with Palestinian group Hamas expired will likely be the focus of this week’s Sunday news shows. title: Trump woos voters in Iowa as primary season nears: Watch live
description: Former President Trump will make two campaign stops in Iowa Saturday, ahead of the state's primary caucuses — which are less than 50 days away. title: Heavy lifting will pay off for American offshore wind
description: By using all the policy levers at hand to withstand today’s economic challenges, we’ll keep the U.S. on course to build out offshore wind at the scale we need, unlocking transformative benefits for generations.

title: Biden’s 2024 rivals launch attacks over Israel-Hamas hostage talks
description: President Biden’s role in high-stakes talks between Israel and Hamas is drawing attacks from his 2024 presidential challengers, pulling the fraught issue of hostage negotiations into America’s presidential race. title: Has DeSantis also blown his chances in 2028?
description: Has he flushed all of that goodwill and potential down the political toilet because he jumped the gun, seemed disloyal, comes across as aloof and continually makes one rookie mistake after another?

title: House Republicans: Can we finally have a sincere effort to pass the budget?
description: Instead of pushing for spending bills destined for failure, it’s time for the House to get to work and fund the budget in keeping with their budget deal.

title: Why do we feel colder as we age?
description: Find yourself needing more layers before going out in winter than when you were a kid? You aren't alone.

description: Clearly, climate change is no longer a looming concern — it is here, and it is already wreaking havoc on our health.

title: Harris pledges $3 billion to help developing countries with climate solutions
description: On Saturday, the U.S. pledged $3 billion to help developing countries mitigate and combat climate change.  “Today, I am also proud to announce a new $3 billion pledge to the Green Climate Fund, which helps developing countries invest in resilience, clean energy and nature-based solutions,” Vice President Kamala Harris said Friday during a speech at...

title: Bolton argues US effort to prolong Middle East truce is 'objectively pro-Hamas'
description: Former National Security Advisor John Bolton blasted efforts to extend the truce in the Israel-Hamas war, calling them “objectively pro-Hamas.” The Biden administration, factions of the Israeli government and regional allies have urged the two sides to continue a pause in fighting, which ended Friday. title: Oil and gas producers pledge to cut methane emissions at UN climate talks
description: A group of 50 major oil and gas companies signed a pledge to cut methane emissions during the Dubai COP28 climate summit on Saturday, in a move that some climate activists are downplaying as a “smokescreen.” The coalition of oil producers includes the largest state-owned operations, including Saudi Aramco, alongside major American companies like ExxonMobil....

title: Arizona journalist arrested while covering pro-Palestine protest
description: A journalist was arrested Thursday in Tuscon, Ariz., while covering a small pro-Palestine protest outside a Raytheon facility at the University of Arizona Tech Park.  Alisa Reznick of public radio station KJZZ was detained by a Pima County sheriff's deputy while leaving the protest and walking back to her car. title: Raskin to Trump allies who voted to oust Santos: Drop your support 'immediately'
description: Rep. Jamie Raskin (D-Md.) went after Republicans who voted to expel former Rep. George Santos (R-N.Y.) on Friday but still support former President Trump, arguing Trump is much worse than Santos. title: Long-shot candidates blast Florida Democrats for absence on primary ballot
